author: Jon Porter
title: Facebook invests $100M in journalism as COVID-19 makes it more vital than ever
description: Facebook has pledged to invest $100 million in the news industry. $25 million will come in grants through the Facebook Journalism Project, while $75 million will come in the form of “additional marketing spend.”
content:
In the form of direct grants and advertising spend
